item.description:
Hello,

Does anyone feel like going ice skating at the Frog Pond? I'm thinking Dim Sum first and then ice skating afterwards if the weather's agreeable. If it's too cold for skating, we can always catch a movie in the Boston Commons theater.

Also, as you may or may not know, Meetup.com charges a fee to maintain a group on their website. We're hoping that everyone can donate $1 for each meetup you attend to help cover the costs of the Meetup group so we can keep organizing more meetup events in the future!

Thanks for your support!
Brenda

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Dim Sum in Chinatown and Ice Skating at the Frog Pond
